p: In 2012-2013 season, B/Yam viruses were predominant, related to B/Massachusetts/02/2012, strain recommended for 2013/2014 vaccine. During 2015-2016, 2016-2017 and 2017-2018 seasons a complete or nearly complete mismatch between the predominant influenza B lineage and vaccine B lineage occurred. In 2015-2016 season, type B IVs belonged to B/Vic lineage (clade 1A), related to B/Brisbane/60/2008, recommended in the 2016-2017 trivalent vaccine formulation.
